00151 int nfs3_Readdirplus( nfs_arg_t               * parg,    
00152                       exportlist_t            * pexport, 
00153                       fsal_op_context_t       * pcontext,   
00154                       cache_inode_client_t    * pclient,
00155                       hash_table_t            * ht,
00156                       struct svc_req          * preq,    
00157                       nfs_res_t               * pres )
00158 {
00159         static char   __attribute__(( __unused__ ))     funcName[] = "nfs3_Readdirplus";
00160 
00161   typedef char    entry_name_array_item_t[FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN] ;
00162   typedef char    fh3_buffer_item_t[NFS3_FHSIZE] ;
00163   
00164   unsigned int                 delta = 0                ;
00165   cache_entry_t             * dir_pentry     = NULL    ;
00166   cache_entry_t             * pentry_dot_dot = NULL    ;
00167   unsigned long               dircount                 ;
00168   unsigned long               maxcount                 ;
00169   fsal_attrib_list_t          dir_attr                 ;
00170   fsal_attrib_list_t          entry_attr               ;
00171   unsigned int                begin_cookie           ;
00172   unsigned int                end_cookie               ;
00173   unsigned int                cache_inode_cookie       ;
00174   cache_inode_dir_entry_t   * dirent_array = NULL    ;
00175   unsigned int              * cookie_array = NULL      ;
00176         cookieverf3                 cookie_verifier        ;
00177   int                         rc                       ;
00178   unsigned int                i = 0                    ;
00179   unsigned int                num_entries              ;
00180   unsigned long               space_used               ;
00181   unsigned long               estimated_num_entries    ;
00182   unsigned long               asked_num_entries        ;
00183   cache_inode_file_type_t     dir_filetype             ;
00184   cache_inode_endofdir_t      eod_met = UNASSIGNED_EOD ;
00185   cache_inode_status_t        cache_status             ;
00186   cache_inode_status_t        cache_status_gethandle   ;
00187   fsal_handle_t             * pfsal_handle = NULL      ;
00188   entry_name_array_item_t   * entry_name_array = NULL  ;
00189   fh3_buffer_item_t         * fh3_array = NULL         ;
00190   
00191         /* to avoid setting it on each error case */
00192         pres->res_readdir3.READDIR3res_u.resfail.dir_attributes.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00193 
00194         dircount              = parg->arg_readdirplus3.dircount;
00195         maxcount              = parg->arg_readdirplus3.maxcount;
00196         begin_cookie          = (unsigned int)parg->arg_readdirplus3.cookie;
00197         space_used            = sizeof(READDIRPLUS3resok);
00198         estimated_num_entries = dircount / sizeof(entryplus3);
00199 
00200 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFS_READDIR
00201   printf( "---> nfs3_Readdirplus: dircount=%d  maxcount=%d  begin_cookie=%d  space_used=%d  estimated_num_entries=%d\n", 
00202           dircount, maxcount, begin_cookie, space_used, estimated_num_entries ) ;
00203 #endif
00204  
00205   /* Is this a xattr FH ? */
00206   if( nfs3_Is_Fh_Xattr( &(parg->arg_readdirplus3.dir) ) )
00207    return nfs3_Readdirplus_Xattr( parg,
00208                                   pexport,
00209                                   pcontext,
00210                                   pclient,
00211                                   ht,
00212                                   preq,
00213                                   pres ) ;
00214   
00215   /* Convert file handle into a vnode */ 
00216   /* BUGAZOMEU : rajouter acces direct au DIR_CONTINUE */
00217   if( ( dir_pentry = nfs_FhandleToCache( preq->rq_vers, 
00218                                          NULL,
00219                                          &(parg->arg_readdirplus3.dir),
00220                                          NULL, 
00221                                          NULL,
00222                                          &(pres->res_readdirplus3.status),
00223                                          NULL, 
00224                                          &dir_attr,
00225                                          pcontext, 
00226                                          pclient, 
00227                                          ht, 
00228                                          &rc ) ) == NULL )
00229     {
00230       /* return NFS_REQ_DROP ; */
00231      return rc ;
00232     }
00233 
00234   /* Extract the filetype */
00235   dir_filetype = cache_inode_fsal_type_convert( dir_attr.type ) ;
00236   
00237         /* Sanity checks -- must be a directory */
00238 
00239   if( ( dir_filetype != DIR_BEGINNING ) && ( dir_filetype != DIR_CONTINUE ) )
00240     {
00241       pres->res_readdirplus3.status = NFS3ERR_NOTDIR;
00242       return NFS_REQ_OK;
00243     } /* switch */
00244   
00245 
00246 
00247   memset(cookie_verifier, 0, sizeof(cookieverf3));
00248 
00249   /*
00250    * If cookie verifier is used, then an non-trivial value is
00251    * returned to the client         This value is the mtime of
00252    * the directory. If verifier is unused (as in many NFS
00253    * Servers) then only a set of zeros is returned (trivial
00254    * value) 
00255    */
00256   
00257   if( pexport->UseCookieVerifier )
00258     memcpy( cookie_verifier, &(dir_attr.mtime), sizeof( dir_attr.mtime ) );
00259   
00260   /*
00261    * nothing to do if != 0 because the area is already full of
00262    * zero 
00263    */
00264   
00265   if( pexport->UseCookieVerifier && ( begin_cookie != 0 ) )
00266                 {
00267                         /*
00268                          * Not the first call, so we have to check the cookie
00269                          * verifier 
00270                          */
00271                         if (memcmp(cookie_verifier, parg->arg_readdirplus3.cookieverf, NFS3_COOKIEVERFSIZE) != 0)
00272         {
00273           pres->res_readdirplus3.status = NFS3ERR_BAD_COOKIE;
00274           
00275           return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00276         }
00277                 }
00278 
00279 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00280   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00281   BuddySetDebugLabel( "cache_inode_dir_entry_t in nfs3_Readdirplus" ) ;
00282 #endif 
00283 
00284         if( ( dirent_array = (cache_inode_dir_entry_t *)Mem_Alloc( estimated_num_entries * sizeof( cache_inode_dir_entry_t ) ) ) == NULL )
00285     {
00286       pres->res_readdirplus3.status = NFS3ERR_IO ;
00287       return NFS_REQ_DROP ;
00288     }
00289 
00290 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00291   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00292   BuddySetDebugLabel( "cookie array in nfs3_Readdirplus" ) ;
00293 #endif
00294 
00295   if( ( cookie_array = (unsigned int *)Mem_Alloc( estimated_num_entries * sizeof( unsigned int ) ) ) == NULL )
00296     {
00297       Mem_Free( (char *)dirent_array ) ;
00298       pres->res_readdirplus3.status = NFS3ERR_IO ;
00299       return NFS_REQ_DROP ;
00300     }
00301   
00302   pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries = NULL;
00303   pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.eof     = FALSE;
00304 
00305   /* How many entries will we retry from cache_inode ? */
00306   if( begin_cookie > 1 )
00307     {
00308       asked_num_entries  = estimated_num_entries ;
00309       cache_inode_cookie = begin_cookie - 2 ;
00310     }
00311   else
00312     {
00313       asked_num_entries  = ( ( estimated_num_entries > 2 ) ? estimated_num_entries - 2 : 0 ) ; /* Keep space for '.' and '..' */
00314       cache_inode_cookie = 0 ;
00315     }
00316   
00317   /* A definition that will be very useful to avoid very long names for variables */
00318 #define RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply
00319   
00320   /* Call readdir */
00321   if( cache_inode_readdir( dir_pentry, 
00322                            cache_inode_cookie,
00323                            asked_num_entries, 
00324                            &num_entries, 
00325                            &end_cookie,
00326                            &eod_met, 
00327                            dirent_array, 
00328                            cookie_array,
00329                            ht, 
00330                            pclient, 
00331                            pcontext, 
00332                            &cache_status ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00333     {
00334 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFS_READDIR
00335       printf( "-- Readdirplus3 -> Call to cache_inode_readdir( cookie=%d, asked=%d ) -> num_entries = %d\n", 
00336          cache_inode_cookie, asked_num_entries, num_entries ) ; 
00337       
00338       if( eod_met == END_OF_DIR )
00339         {
00340           printf( "+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++> EOD MET \n" ) ;
00341         }
00342 #endif
00343       
00344       /* If nothing was found, return nothing, but if cookie=0, we should return . and .. */
00345       if( ( num_entries == 0 ) && ( asked_num_entries != 0 ) && ( begin_cookie > 1  ) )
00346         {
00347           pres->res_readdirplus3.status                                = NFS3_OK;
00348           pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries = NULL;
00349           pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.eof     = TRUE;
00350     
00351           nfs_SetPostOpAttr( pcontext, pexport,
00352                              dir_pentry, 
00353                              NULL,
00354                              &(pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.dir_attributes) );
00355           
00356           memcpy( pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.cookieverf, 
00357                   cookie_verifier, 
00358                   sizeof( cookieverf3 ) );
00359         }
00360       else
00361         {
00362 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00363           /* For debugging memory leaks */
00364           BuddySetDebugLabel( "entry_name_array in nfs3_Readdirplus" );
00365 #endif   
00366           /* Allocation of the structure for reply */
00367           entry_name_array = (entry_name_array_item_t  *)Mem_Alloc( estimated_num_entries * ( FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN + 1));
00368           
00369           if( entry_name_array == NULL )
00370             {
00371               Mem_Free( (char *)dirent_array ) ;
00372               Mem_Free( (char *)cookie_array ) ;
00373               return NFS_REQ_DROP;
00374             }
00375 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00376           /* For debugging memory leaks */
00377           BuddySetDebugLabel( "READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries" ) ;
00378 #endif  
00379           pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries = (entryplus3 *)Mem_Alloc( estimated_num_entries * sizeof(entryplus3));
00380 
00381           
00382           if( pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries == NULL )
00383             {
00384               Mem_Free( (char *)dirent_array );
00385               Mem_Free( (char *)cookie_array ) ;
00386               Mem_Free( (char *)entry_name_array );     
00387               return NFS_REQ_DROP;
00388             }
00389 
00390           /* Allocation of the file handles */
00391 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00392           /* For debugging memory leaks */
00393           BuddySetDebugLabel( "Filehandle V3 in nfs3_Readdirplus" ) ;
00394 #endif   
00395           fh3_array = (fh3_buffer_item_t *)Mem_Alloc( estimated_num_entries * NFS3_FHSIZE ) ;
00396 
00397 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00398           /* For debugging memory leaks */
00399           BuddySetDebugLabel( "N/A" ) ;
00400 #endif   
00401         
00402           if( fh3_array == NULL )
00403             {
00404               Mem_Free( (char *)dirent_array );
00405               Mem_Free( (char *)cookie_array ) ;
00406               Mem_Free( (char *)entry_name_array );     
00407 
00408               return NFS_REQ_DROP;
00409             }
00410 
00411           delta = 0 ;
00412 
00413           /* manage . and .. */
00414           if( begin_cookie == 0 )
00415             {
00416               /* Fill in '.' */
00417               if( estimated_num_entries > 0 )
00418                 {
00419                   if( ( pfsal_handle = cache_inode_get_fsal_handle( dir_pentry, 
00420                                                                     &cache_status_gethandle ) ) == NULL )
00421                     {
00422                       Mem_Free( (char *)dirent_array ) ;
00423                       Mem_Free( (char *)cookie_array ) ;
00424                       Mem_Free( (char *)entry_name_array );     
00425                       Mem_Free( (char *)fh3_array ) ;
00426 
00427                       pres->res_readdirplus3.status = nfs3_Errno( cache_status_gethandle ) ;
00428                       return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00429                     }
00430                   
00431                   FSAL_DigestHandle( pcontext->export_context,
00432                                      FSAL_DIGEST_FILEID3, 
00433                                      pfsal_handle,
00434                                      (caddr_t)&(RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[0].fileid) ) ;
00435 
00436                   RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[0].name = entry_name_array[0] ;
00437                   strcpy( RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[0].name, "." ) ;
00438 
00439                   RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[0].cookie = 1 ;
00440 
00441                   pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries[0].name_handle.post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_val  
00442                     = (char *)fh3_array[0] ;
00443                   
00444                   if( nfs3_FSALToFhandle( &pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries[0].name_handle.post_op_fh3_u.handle,  
00445                                           pfsal_handle,
00446                                           pexport ) == 0  )
00447                     {
00448                       Mem_Free( (char *)dirent_array ) ;
00449                       Mem_Free( (char *)cookie_array ) ;
00450                       Mem_Free( (char *)entry_name_array );     
00451                       Mem_Free( (char *)fh3_array ) ;
00452 
00453                       pres->res_readdirplus3.status = NFS3ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00454                       return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00455                     }
00456 
00457     
00458                   RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[0].name_attributes.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00459                   RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[0].name_handle.handle_follows = FALSE;
00460                   
00461                   cache_inode_get_attributes(  dir_pentry, &entry_attr ) ;
00462                   
00463                   /* Set PostPoFh3 structure */
00464                   pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries[0].name_handle.handle_follows = TRUE ;
00465                   pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries[0].name_handle.post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_len =
00466                     sizeof( file_handle_v3_t ) ;
00467                   
00468                   nfs_SetPostOpAttr( pcontext, pexport,
00469                                      dir_pentry,
00470                                      &entry_attr,
00471                                      &(pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries[0].name_attributes));
00472 
00473                   delta += 1;
00474                 }
00475               
00476             }
00477               
00478               /* Fill in '..' */
00479           if( begin_cookie <= 1 )
00480             {
00481               if( estimated_num_entries > delta ) 
00482                 {
00483                   if( ( pentry_dot_dot = cache_inode_lookupp( dir_pentry, 
00484                                                               ht, 
00485                                                               pclient, 
00486                                                               pcontext, 
00487                                                               &cache_status_gethandle ) ) == NULL )
00488                     {
00489                       Mem_Free( (char *)dirent_array ) ;
00490                       Mem_Free( (char *)cookie_array ) ;
00491                       Mem_Free( (char *)entry_name_array );     
00492                       Mem_Free( (char *)fh3_array ) ;
00493 
00494                       pres->res_readdirplus3.status = nfs3_Errno( cache_status_gethandle ) ;
00495                       return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00496                     }
00497                   
00498                   if( ( pfsal_handle = cache_inode_get_fsal_handle( pentry_dot_dot,
00499                                                                     &cache_status_gethandle ) ) == NULL )
00500                     {
00501                       Mem_Free( (char *)dirent_array ) ;
00502                       Mem_Free( (char *)cookie_array ) ;
00503                       Mem_Free( (char *)entry_name_array );     
00504                       Mem_Free( (char *)fh3_array ) ;
00505 
00506                       pres->res_readdirplus3.status = nfs3_Errno( cache_status_gethandle ) ;
00507                       return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00508                     }
00509                   
00510                   FSAL_DigestHandle( pcontext->export_context,
00511                                      FSAL_DIGEST_FILEID3,
00512                                      pfsal_handle,
00513                                      (caddr_t)&(RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[delta].fileid) ) ;
00514 
00515                   RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[delta].name = entry_name_array[delta] ;
00516                   strcpy( RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[delta].name, ".." ) ;
00517 
00518                   /* Getting a file handle */
00519                   pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries[delta].name_handle.post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_val  =
00520                     (char *)fh3_array[delta] ;
00521                   
00522                   if( nfs3_FSALToFhandle( &pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries[0].name_handle.post_op_fh3_u.handle,
00523                                           pfsal_handle,
00524                                           pexport ) == 0  )
00525                     {
00526                       Mem_Free( (char *)dirent_array ) ;
00527                       Mem_Free( (char *)cookie_array ) ;
00528                       Mem_Free( (char *)entry_name_array );     
00529                       Mem_Free( (char *)fh3_array ) ;
00530 
00531                       pres->res_readdirplus3.status = NFS3ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00532                       return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00533                     }
00534                   
00535                   RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[delta].cookie = 2 ;
00536 
00537                       
00538                   RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[delta].name_attributes.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00539                   RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[delta].name_handle.handle_follows = FALSE;
00540 
00541                   cache_inode_get_attributes(  pentry_dot_dot, &entry_attr ) ;
00542 
00543                   /* Set PostPoFh3 structure */
00544                   pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries[delta].name_handle.handle_follows = TRUE ;
00545                   pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries[delta].name_handle.post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_len =
00546                     sizeof( file_handle_v3_t ) ;
00547                   
00548                   nfs_SetPostOpAttr( pcontext, pexport,
00549                                      pentry_dot_dot,
00550                                      &entry_attr,
00551                                      &(pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries[delta].name_attributes));
00552                   
00553                   
00554                   
00555                 }
00556               RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[0].nextentry = &(RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[delta]) ;
00557 
00558               if( num_entries > delta + 1  ) /* not 0 ??? */
00559                 RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[delta].nextentry = &(RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[delta+1]) ;
00560               else
00561                 RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[delta].nextentry = NULL ;
00562               
00563               delta += 1 ;
00564             } /* if( begin_cookie == 0 ) */
00565       
00566           for( i = delta; i < num_entries + delta ; i++ )
00567             {
00568               unsigned long   needed;
00569 
00570               /* dircount is the size without the FH and attributes overhead, so entry3 is used intead of entryplus3 */
00571               needed = sizeof(entry3) + ( ( strlen( dirent_array[i-delta].name.name) + 3) & ~3) ;
00572 
00573 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFS_READDIR
00574               /* printf( "==============> i=%d sizeof(entryplus3)=%d needed=%d space_used=%d maxcount=%d num_entries=%d asked_num_entries=%d\n",
00575                  i, sizeof( entryplus3 ), needed, space_used, maxcount, num_entries, asked_num_entries ) ; */
00576 #endif              
00577               if( ( space_used += needed ) > maxcount )
00578                 {
00579                   if( i == delta )
00580                     {
00581                       /*
00582                        * Not enough room to make even a single reply 
00583                        */
00584                       Mem_Free( (char *)dirent_array ) ;
00585                       Mem_Free( (char *)cookie_array ) ;
00586                       Mem_Free( (char *)entry_name_array );     
00587                       Mem_Free( (char *)fh3_array ) ;
00588 
00589                       pres->res_readdirplus3.status = NFS3ERR_TOOSMALL;
00590 
00591                       return NFS_REQ_OK;
00592                     }
00593                   break ; /* Make post traitement */
00594                 }
00595               
00596               /*
00597                * Get information specific to this entry
00598                */
00599               if( ( pfsal_handle = cache_inode_get_fsal_handle( dirent_array[i-delta].pentry, 
00600                                                                 &cache_status_gethandle ) ) == NULL )
00601                 {
00602                   Mem_Free( (char *)dirent_array ) ;
00603                   Mem_Free( (char *)cookie_array ) ;
00604                   Mem_Free( (char *)entry_name_array ); 
00605                   Mem_Free( (char *)fh3_array ) ;
00606                   
00607                   pres->res_readdirplus3.status = nfs3_Errno( cache_status_gethandle ) ;
00608                   return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00609                 }
00610 
00611               /* Now fill in the replyed entryplus3 list */
00612               FSAL_DigestHandle( pcontext->export_context,
00613                                  FSAL_DIGEST_FILEID3, 
00614                                  pfsal_handle,
00615                                  (caddr_t)&(RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[i].fileid) ) ;
00616               
00617               FSAL_name2str(  &dirent_array[i-delta].name, entry_name_array[i], FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN ) ;
00618               RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[i].name = entry_name_array[i];
00619 
00620               if( i != num_entries + delta - 1 )
00621                 RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[i].cookie = cookie_array[i+1-delta]+2;
00622               else
00623                 RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[i].cookie = end_cookie+2 ;
00624               
00625               RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[i].name_attributes.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00626               RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[i].name_handle.handle_follows = FALSE;
00627 
00628               cache_inode_get_attributes( dirent_array[i-delta].pentry, &entry_attr ) ;
00629               
00630               pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries[i].name_handle.post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_val  = 
00631                 (char *)fh3_array[i] ;
00632 
00633               /* Compute the NFSv3 file handle */
00634               if( nfs3_FSALToFhandle( &pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries[i].name_handle.post_op_fh3_u.handle,
00635                                       pfsal_handle,
00636                                       pexport ) == 0  )
00637                 {
00638                   Mem_Free( (char *)dirent_array ) ;
00639                   Mem_Free( (char *)cookie_array ) ;
00640                   Mem_Free( (char *)entry_name_array ); 
00641                   Mem_Free( (char *)fh3_array ) ;
00642                   
00643                   pres->res_readdirplus3.status = NFS3ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00644                   return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00645                 }
00646               
00647 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFS_READDIR
00648               printf( "-- Readdirplus3 -> i=%d num_entries=%d needed=%d space_used=%lu maxcount=%lu Name=%s FileId=%llu Cookie=%llu\n", 
00649                       i, num_entries, needed, space_used, maxcount, dirent_array[i-delta].name.name, 
00650                       RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[i].fileid, RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[i].cookie ) ;
00651 #endif
00652               
00653               /* Set PostPoFh3 structure */
00654               pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries[i].name_handle.handle_follows = TRUE ;
00655               pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries[i].name_handle.post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_len =
00656                 sizeof( file_handle_v3_t ) ;
00657 
00658               nfs_SetPostOpAttr( pcontext, pexport,
00659                                  dirent_array[i-delta].pentry,
00660                                  &entry_attr,
00661                                  &(pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.entries[i].name_attributes));
00662               
00663               RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[i].nextentry = NULL;
00664               if (i != 0)
00665                 RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[i - 1].nextentry = &(RES_READDIRPLUS_REPLY.entries[i]);
00666             }
00667           
00668           pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.eof = FALSE;
00669         }
00670       
00671       
00672       nfs_SetPostOpAttr( pcontext,  
00673                          pexport,
00674                          dir_pentry,
00675                          &dir_attr,
00676                          &(pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.dir_attributes));
00677       
00678       memcpy(pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.cookieverf,
00679              cookie_verifier, sizeof(cookieverf3));
00680       
00681       pres->res_readdirplus3.status = NFS3_OK;
00682       
00683       if( ( eod_met == END_OF_DIR ) && ( i == num_entries + delta ) )
00684         {
00685           /* End of directory */
00686 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFS_READDIR
00687           printf( "============================================================> EOD MET !!!!!!\n" ) ;
00688 #endif
00689           pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.eof = TRUE ;
00690         }
00691       else
00692         pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply.eof = FALSE ;
00693       
00694       nfs_SetPostOpAttr( pcontext, pexport,
00695                          dir_pentry, 
00696                          &dir_attr,
00697                          &(pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.dir_attributes ) );
00698       memcpy(pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.cookieverf, cookie_verifier, sizeof(cookieverf3));
00699       
00700 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFS_READDIR
00701       printf( "============================================================\n" ) ;
00702 #endif
00703  
00704       /* Free the memory */
00705       Mem_Free( (char *)dirent_array );
00706       Mem_Free( (char *)cookie_array ) ;
00707 
00708       return NFS_REQ_OK;
00709     }
00710   
00711   /* If we are here, there was an error */
00712 
00713   /* Free the memory */
00714   Mem_Free( (char *)dirent_array );
00715   Mem_Free( (char *)cookie_array ) ;
00716   Mem_Free( (char *)entry_name_array ); 
00717   Mem_Free( (char *)fh3_array ) ;
00718 
00719         /* Is this a retryable error */
00720         if( nfs_RetryableError( cache_status ) )
00721                 return NFS_REQ_DROP;
00722   
00723   /* Set failed status */
00724         nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00725                        NFS_V3, 
00726                        cache_status,
00727                        NULL,
00728                        &pres->res_readdirplus3.status,
00729                        dir_pentry,
00730                        &(pres->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resfail.dir_attributes),
00731                        NULL, NULL, NULL,
00732                        NULL, NULL, NULL);
00733   
00734         return NFS_REQ_OK;
00735 } /* nfs3_Readdirplus */
00736 
00745 void nfs3_Readdirplus_Free(nfs_res_t * resp)
00746 {
00747 #define PRESREADDIRPLUSREPLY resp->res_readdirplus3.READDIRPLUS3res_u.resok.reply
00748   if( (resp->res_readdirplus3.status == NFS3_OK) &&
00749       (PRESREADDIRPLUSREPLY.entries != NULL) )
00750     {
00751       /* All is allocated as a single array */
00752       Mem_Free( PRESREADDIRPLUSREPLY.entries[0].name ) ; 
00753       Mem_Free( PRESREADDIRPLUSREPLY.entries[0].name_handle.post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_val ) ;
00754       Mem_Free( PRESREADDIRPLUSREPLY.entries);      
00755     }
00756 } /*  nfs3_Readdirplus_Free */
